step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! You're stretching your arm overhead. Remember to keep it straight and feel the stretch.
Great! Open your palm and fingers wide, really spreading them out.
Well done! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good start for the second repetition. Maintain that comfortable posture with your arm extended overhead.
You're doing great extending your arm overhead. Keep that stretch going strong.
Fantastic! Keep those fingers spread wide as you prepare for the next movement.
Perfect! You made a fist while inhaling and tightening. Keep visualizing that lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a fist while inhaling, visualizing the fluid moving. Keep up the good work!
